column4: Having trouble installing GoogleEarth package.  Any offers to help?
Installed using synaptic.  Seemed to Download but there were numerous errors and it did not take.
install lsb-core then doenload and install this version: googleearth_6.0.1.2032+0.5.7-1_i386.deb , or checkout this site: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=1648071
make sure you use this version : googleearth_6.0.1.2032+0.5.7-1_i386.deb
